title: 2021 U-23 Baseball World Cup
description:
The 2021 U-23 Baseball World Cup, officially III U-23 Baseball World Cup, is the third edition of the U-23 Baseball World Cup tournament, fourth since the tournament's inception in 2014 as the 21U Baseball World Cup. Originally scheduled to take place in 2020, the event was postponed to 2021 in as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.
The tournament is supposed to be staged biennially, with the last edition in 2018, but the 2020 competition was postponed due to COVID-19.
Consequently, the World Baseball Softball Confederation (WBSC) has expanded the age category to include players up to the age of 24, who would have missed out on the event.
Accordingly, players born from 1997 to 2003 will be eligible to participate.
